topics_researched.key_finding: iOS 26+ uses .listSectionIndexVisibility() + .sectionIndexLabel() for A-Z vertical index, requires single-letter section labels
Native symbols (tram.fill, lightrail.fill, train.side.front.car, bus.fill, ferry.fill) via Image(systemName:), always add .accessibilityLabel()
Segmented control (.pickerStyle(.segmented)) best for 3-7 mutually exclusive options with short labels, avoid in toolbars per iOS HIG
Value-based NavigationLink (value: + .navigationDestination(for:)) better for state management, destination view initializes ViewModel with passed data
SF Symbols require explicit .accessibilityLabel() for VoiceOver (e.g., 'Train stop'), labels should be 1-3 words describing purpose
